EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your feedback!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, Thank you to everyone who participated in our 2021 Customer Satisfaction survey. Your feedback matters to us. Your insights allow us to continue to improve how we support your business and make simple possible for you. We are currently analyzing your feedback and will reach back out once we’ve defined the improvements and actions we plan to undertake in response to your input. Thank you once more for being a customer of NCR.
